page.title: 10Tweedside Sports Club, Kelso
page.content: The{Tweedside Sports Club}has been open for four years now. There are two squash courts, a gymnasium, a sauna and jacuzzi, a cafe, a bar and the Cellar Bar Disco. Now the club is up for sale. The District Council are thinking of buying it. We asked 150 Kelso people what they thought should happen to the club. We found that more than half of the people we asked had never used the club. We asked if people thought the council should buy the club.{71%}thought that they should and{19%}thought they shouldn't.{10% didn't know. When we asked if part of the club should become a mini cinema, {55%}said yes and{37%}said no. We also asked what people would like to see in the club. Most people wanted a youth club{(65%)}and keep-fit classes{(43%). We think the Council{should}buy the Tweedside Sports Club.
